snippet.title: SUPER BATTLE POLYCARS : Steam Early Access Announcement
snippet.description:
Hop into the driver's seat in this modern old-school vehicle combat game! Fight for victory alongside your teammates in our Massive Online Vehicle Arena to put your driving skills to the test or spawn into arena deathmatch! DRIVE the fastest, DESTROY the competition, and DOMINATE.

Planned for Steam Early Access release June 2024.

Wishlist on Steam today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2844320/SUPER_BATTLE_POLYCARS/

Join our community Discord for the latest developer updates and announcements!
https://discord.gg/yoopergamestudiosllc
